This is a website and github repository for our project about impact of COVID-19 on TB notifications in Blantyre, Malawi.

The github repo is at https://github.com/rachaelmburke/tbcovidblantyre

Here you will find

1. R markdown file with analyses
2. Knitted R markdown file (same as the one on this webpage)
3. .csv file of monthly total TB case notifications from June 2016 until December 2020
4. .rdata file of modelled quarterly Blantyre population by age and sex (based on Govt of Malawi censuses in 2008 and 2018, with thanks to Chu Chang Ku)
